entry.title: SALBAKOS 6 Piece Bath Towel Set - Turkish Luxury Hotel & Spa Collection - Oeko-TEX Organic - Eco-Friendly Turkish Cotton (Purple)
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 42.99 - 259.99 (34 variants)

American Pillowcase has been selling Turkish towels for more than 15 years and contracts with only the very best mills in Turkey. Presently American Pillowcase has 5 of the top selling towels on Amazon. This can't be done without making a superb product at a great price. Towels made in Turkey are softer and more durable because it is the only country which does not use any bleach in the manufacturing process, including white towels. All Turkish towels are VAT dyed which means the dye is infused into the yarns under high pressure and high temperature for 6-12 hours depending upon the color. This limits any fading of even the brightest colors. Even white towels are dyed white, not bleach white. For maximum color retention and softness, do not use any bleach when washing these towels. You will feel the softness immediately, and the towels will get softer after each washing. And by using only Turkish cotton and double-stitching all the hems the durability is un-equaled. These towels should last you many years! In addition, the towels are made in an Oeko-Tex and ISO 9001 mill. This means that all materials must be chemical and pesticide free and that the mill operated at the highest quality standards and is audited regularly. Email me and I will be happy to send you the certificates. If for any reason, you would not give these 5 stars, please email and let me know.
  • 100% Genuine Turkish Cotton
  • IMPORTED FROM DENIZLI TURKEY
  • 2 Luxury Bath Sheets 35x70
  • Matching bath towels (B00GEGLB5C), hand towels (B00KQQTW0W), washcloth (B00GEFSCKA), bath mats (B00J1O3BZ2), and 6 piece sets (B00K6ORZ6C) available . Type in number in () into Amazon search box.
  • Extra thick weave. 700+ gsm. All hems are double-stitched for extra durability
  • Oeko-Tex and ISO 9001. All Materials are Pesticide and Harmful Chemical Free!
  • Aqua is vat dyed for 6+ hours so will remain bright

entry.title: SALBAKOS Bath Towels Sets Luxury Hotel and Spa Quality Collection (White)
entry.summary:

Type:
Price: 237.99

American Pillowcase has been selling Turkish cotton bath towels for more than 15 years and contracts with only the very best mills in Turkey. Presently American Pillowcase has 5 of the top selling pure cotton bath towels on Amazon. This can't be done without continually providing superb products at great prices. Bath towels made in Turkey are softer and more durable because it is the only country which does not use any bleach in the manufacturing process, including our hotel collection white towels. SALBAKOS luxury cotton towels are great to take to the gym for a workout. You will immediately recognize the quality, much like that of hair towels found at a high end salon. All Turkish bath towels are vat-dyed which means the dye is infused into the yarns under high pressure and high temperature for 6-12 hours depending upon the color. This limits any fading of even the brightest colors. Even our pure white bath towels are dyed white, not bleach white. For maximum color retention and softness, do not use any bleach when washing these Turkish cotton towels. You will feel the softness immediately, and these towels will continually get softer with each washing. And thanks to using only the finest Turkish cotton and double-stitching all the hems, the durability is unequaled. These bath towels should last you many years! In addition, these luxury spa-quality bath towels are made in an Oeko-Tex and ISO 9001 mill. This means that all materials must be chemical-free and pesticide-free and that the mill operates at the highest quality standards and is audited regularly.

They are 700 GSM and a full pound heavier than other luxury hotel bath towels. Enjoy super absorbent, premium bathroom towels for your home today!

Unlike most towels that get coarse and rough after a few washes, our high-performance luxury hotel towel sets are made with 100% genuine Turkish cotton that gets softer with each use

entry.title: SALBAKOS Luxury Hotel & Spa Turkish Cotton 12-Piece Eco-Friendly Washcloth Set for Bath, 13 x 13 Inch - Pick Size and Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 23.32 - 26.50 (8 variants)

100% Genuine Turkish Cotton  SALBAKOS Towels are made in Turkey creating softer and more durable towels because it is the only country which does not use any bleach in the manufacturing process. You will feel the softness immediately and will find the perfect color to match your home décor! With Turkish Cotton, the cotton fiber open up more and the towel actually gets softer over time. Complete The Set With many styles and 16 colors of 100% Genuine Turkish Cotton Towels, SALBAKOS provides the complete package of washcloths, bath towels, hand towels, bath sheets and bath mats to meet all your needs.

Hand Towels measure 16 x 30 Inches

Washcloths measure 13 x 13 Inches

Bath Sheets measure 35 x 75 Inches

Bath Towels measure 27 x 54 Inches

Bath Mats measure 20 x 30 Inches


Q1: Can you use bleach on these towels? A1: No, please do not use bleach on these towels. The bleach will dis-color the colored towels and will make fine cotton less soft and break down the cotton fiber for a shorter life.

Q2: Are SALBAKOS towels chemical free?

A2:

Q3: Can I use fabric softener on these towels?

A3:

Q4: Do these towels shrink after first wash and dry?

A4:

Premium Quality Design SALBAKOS towels are designed and engineered with double-stitching on the hems creating a durability that is is un-equaled. These towels should provide you many years of comfort and luxury! All Bath Towels you buy from SALBAKOS are made using the highest quality cotton / yarns. These yarns are spun using only long staple cotton making these extremely soft and durable.

Washing Instructions To ensure that your towels stay soft and hold their color, we recommend following these Washing Instructions.

Before use, we recommend removing excess lint and shedding on the towel

Towels can be washed in warm or cold water

Wash before use for the first time as this will get rid of the excess lint and shedding leftover

Wash Towels alone, do not include with other clothes/loads/colors

Do not use bleach or fabric softener at any stage of the washing process, this will strip the color away from the towels and will break down the cotton fiber

We recommend washing towels after 3-4 uses - the more often the better, this helps create a softer, more luxurious feel


Drying Instructions To ensure that your towels last the test of time we recommend following these Drying Instructions.

Dry towels right after they come out of the wash to prevent dampness and lingering smell

Tumble dry on low/medium heat

Do not Iron the towels to prevent burning and cotton degradation

Take towels out when they are 95% dry to prevent over-heating

Wash and Dry 2/3 times before use to ensure maximum absorbency


100% Genuine Turkish Cotton
IMPORTED FROM DENIZLI TURKEY
12 Luxury Wash Cloths 13"x13" - Aqua
Matching bath sheets (B00IM23ST8), bath towels (B00GEGLB5C), hand towels (B00KQQTW0W), bath mats (B00J1O3BZ2), and 6 piece sets (B00K6ORZ6C) available . Type in number in () into Amazon search box.
All hems are double-stitched for extra durability
Oeko-Tex and ISO 9001. All Materials are Pesticide and Harmful Chemical Free!

  • BRIGHT COLORS THAT LAST - To ensure years of vibrant color, these towels are VAT dyed. This means the dye is infused into the yarns under high pressure and temperature for 6-12 hours.
  • ECO-FRIENDLY AND HIGHEST QUALITY – OEKO-TEX Certified - all cotton is grown and all manufacturing processes use no harmful chemicals. Manufactured in an ISO-9001 mill for incredible quality control. See pictures for copies of certifications and below for more on OEKO-TEX
  • SOFTER AFTER EACH WASH - These wash cloths are as absorbent as traditional wash cloths, but unlike many others, these will actually get softer and softer with each wash.
  • MONEY BACK GUARANTEE – Our company stands behind its products. You can return any defective product hassle-free.

entry.title: American Pillowcase 100% Brushed Microfiber Sheets or Sheet Sets, Deep Pocket, Pick Size and Color
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type:
Price: 13.97 - 38.99 (7 variants)

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with American Pillowcase Microfiber Bed Sheets. These sheets are made of 100% double brushed Microfiber for that silky smooth, peach-fuzz feel. Comparable to 5-star hotel materials, these breathable sheets are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The stylish sheets are great for any season; they'll keep you cool on those hot summer nights, and warm in the darkest of winters. The durable linens are long-lasting and will maintain their HIGH-QUALITY wash after wash; keeping their stain, fade, and wrinkles resistant qualities.

Includes: A 54 x 75 Inch Full Microfiber Fitted Sheet with Deep 18 Inch Pockets

Microfiber Fitted Sheets

These fitted sheets have been pre-shrunk, with 18-inch pockets deep enough to easily install over your mattress without worry of it slipping up. To help ensure the fitted sheets stay put, elastic is installed all the way around the edges of the sheets, rather than just in the corners. Thanks to the expert finishing, the fabric's silky softness and smoothness is the perfect addition to your bedroom decor.

Durable Quality; Built Tough

These durable sheets are long-lasting and affordable. Their lightweight, yet long lasting material is perfect for those with allergies. These breathable sheets are hypoallergenic and even prevent dust mite issues. The microfiber material helps reduce allergy reaction and respiratory irritation. When paired with regular washings, these sheets are sure to meet those hypoallergenic needs.





Wrinkle and Stain Resistant

This material is processed in a way that makes this durable fabric maintain their overall brightness and shape for longer periods of time. Additionally, this helps the linens stay wrinkle free and let you enjoy a smooth finish.

The tight weave of these microfibers prevents liquids from soaking in immediately, helping keep these fabrics stain resistant. Quickly clean up your spill before it has a chance to soak in and your sheet will remain stain free.

Care Instructions

When it is time to wash your pre-shrunk sheets, simply toss them into an ordinary washing machine with hot or warm water with mild detergent. Washing at a warmer temperature allows the microfibers to expand, releasing trapped dirt and micro particles.

Air dry is best for these products since microfiber dries relatively quickly. If you do need to use a dryer, set it on low or no heat.
  • 100% Brushed Microfiber - Super Soft, Stain and Wrinkle Resistant
  • FULL SIZE FITTED SHEET 54"x75" - Deep 18" pockets, Qty 1, Blue
  • BRIGHT, VIBRANT COLORS - Matching Flat Sheets and Pillowcases sold separately
  • SOFT, BREATHABLE, LIGHTWEIGHT - Cool in the Summer and warm in the Winter
  • WRINKLE, FADE, STAIN RESISTANT - No ironing needed
  • EASY CARE INSTRUCTIONS: Wash separately. Do not bleach or use fabric softener. Quick Drying

entry.title: American Pillowcase 2 Body Pillowcase Set, 100% Cotton, 300 Thread Count, 21x60 Pillow Cover, Fits 20 x 54, White
entry.summary:
Vendor: American Pillowcase
Type: Kitchen
Price: 27.95

One of the top selling products in the category on Amazon for over 4 years! 100% Long Staple Cotton is breathable to keep you cool in the summer and dry and warm in the winter. 300 Thread Count is perfect for maximum comfort and durability. This is the exact fabric I sold to 5 star, luxury hotels for years. Higher thread count does not mean better quality or comfort. No Zipper to scratch your face or feet. Hypoallergenic, will reduce allergens. Sateen Finish for a smooth surface and luminous sheen. Double Stitched Seams for quality and durability. 21 x 60 inches perfectly covers your 20 x 54 pillow with enough overhang to not see the pillow or tuck back into the pillow for a clean look.

Includes: 2 Body Pillowcases (21"x60" fits 20x54" pillow) with 4” hem

Body Pillowcase

Add some luxurious comfort to your bedroom with this American Pillowcase Body Pillowcase. These pillowcases are made of 100% Egyptian cotton with a breathable, soft sateen weave comparable to those found in 5 star hotels around the globe.

300 Thread Count Egyptian Cotton

Our 300 thread count Egyptian cotton is made with a sateen four over one weave allowing for a silky soft feel. These pillowcases feel smooth and fresh providing the comfort you need for quality nights rest.

Thread count references the number of threads per square inch of fabric. Cotton linens with a thread count of 200-400 are known for a soft, clean feel that is breathable and wicks away moisture.

Care Instructions

You should always wash your cotton sheets in a separate load than your normal laundry, as zippers, hooks and buttons could possibly damage cotton linens. A normal wash cycle with a warm temperature setting is recommended. Quality, pH balanced detergents are best when washing fine cotton linens. Do not use chlorinated bleach as it can damage quality cotton bedding fibers. If needed, non-chlorinated bleach can be used with white and ivory cotton linens. Removing cotton sheets promptly after washing will help reduce wrinkling. Shaking linens out before placing them in the dryer will reduce wrinkling also. When drying, use a warm setting, remove sheets while they are still slightly damp and hang to finish drying. Ironing is optional but not usually necessary for cotton sheets. However, some people prefer to iron them for a crisper appearance.
  • RICH COLORS / BRIGHT WHITE– Machine wash in cold/medium temperature water and do not use bleach to limit fading.
  • 300 THREAD COUNT - Perfect for maximum comfort and durability. Higher thread count does not mean better quality or comfort.
  • DETAILS MATTER - 4" Hems add beauty. Oversized pillowcase keeps pillow out of view. Double stitching adds durability. Fine cotton adds breathability and softness. These cannot be sold cheaper without sacrificing on the quality.
  • 100% MONEY BACK GUARANTEE - If not completely satisfied, return with no-questions asked.
  • MATCHING FLAT AND FITTED SHEETS AND SHAMS – Click on the “Sold by American Pillowcase” link above to find matching sheets and shams as well as entire range of bedding and bath products.
